src:
EVROLIGAŠKI TIKET 09: Parket neka škripi
Za kvotu 9,00 uz ostale sigurice čekamo i prelaz Makabija preko Albe...

07 Nov 2019

MOZZART je danas mislio na ljubitelje kraljice igara! Polon koji se sam nudi opsuje kvota 9,00 koliko vredi EVROLIGAŠKI TIKET 09. Da nismo otišli korak dalje, ovaj listić s istim tipovima bio bi standardno dostupan na koeficijentu 7,11. Dakle, na vama je samo da razmislite koliko bi toga mogli da propustite ukoliko do 18 časova ne obezbedite za sebe jedan ovakav kladilački užitak. Put do njega je savršeno jednostavan... Svratite u najbliži MOZZART i zatražite da vam operater otkuca ovaj tiket, ili sve smesta obavite putem mozzartbet.com aplikacije.


18.00: (2,70) ZENIT (14,5) HIMKI (1,55)



20.00: (2,15) OLIMPIJAKOS (14,5) EFES (1,80)



20.05: (1,20) MAKABI T.A. (19,0) ALBA (5,00)



20.45: (1,60) MILANO (14,5) BASKONIJA (2,55)


Čekamo da Himki u gostima dobije Zenit, zatim da Efes uradi isto Olimpijakosu, ali i da dođe prelaz Makabi Tel Aviva preko berlinske Albe po principu 1-1. Za kraj, trebaće nam i Milano na kecu protiv Baskonije, pa da nakrivimo kapu sa zaokruženom kvotom 9,00. Sve ove partije spadaju u apsolutni kladilački hiperrealizam, pa zato požurite. Radnja može da se obavi do 18 časova, pa je sve što se od vas u ovom momentu traži da DONESETE EVROLIGAŠKU ODLUKU!  


* Kvote su podložne promenama
text:
EUROLEAGUE TICKET 09: Let the parquet creak
For the quota of 9.00, we are waiting for the crossing of Maccabi over Alba with other safes ...

07 Nov 2019

MOZZART meant fans of the Queen of Games today! The self-offered Polon swells at a 9.00 odds on the EURO TICKET 09. If we had not gone one step further, this ticket with the same types would have been available as a standard at a coefficient of 7.11. So, it's up to you to think how much you could miss if you didn't provide one of these betting delights by 6pm. Getting there is perfectly easy ... Drop in at your nearest MOZZART and ask your operator to type this ticket for you, or do it all at once through the mozzartbet.com application.


6pm: (2.70) ZENIT (14.5) CHIM (1.55)



8pm: (2.15) OLYMPIAKOS (14.5) EFES (1.80)



8.05pm: (1.20) MAKABI T.A. (19.0) ALBA (5.00)



20.45: (1.60) MILAN (14.5) BASKONIA (2.55)


We are waiting for the Khimki to receive Zenit away, then Ephesus to do the same to Olympiakos, but also to cross Maccabi Tel Aviv via Berlin's Alba on a 1-1 principle. In the end, we will also need Milan on the hook against Basque Country, so we will tip the cap with a rounded odds of 9.00. All of these games are absolute betting hyperrealism, so hurry up. The action can be completed by 6 pm, so everything you are asked to do at this point is to MAKE A EUROLEAGUE DECISION!


* Odds are subject to change
